name: Hellsinker. Original Soundtrack
detailed_description:
The original soundtrack for Hellsinker.
Includes a total of 44 tracks that make up over 2 hours of original music (MP3 and HQ FLAC format)
This package will also update in-game data to a superior lossless format!

*Soundtrack data will be downloaded into the Hellsinker. installation directory's "Soundtrack" folder.
*In-game audio file data will be updated automatically when installed.

short_description: The original soundtrack for Hellsinker.　Includes a total of 44 tracks that make up over 2 hours of original music (MP3 and HQ FLAC format) This package will also update in-game data to a superior lossless format!
supported_languages: Simplified Chinese, Japanese, English, Traditional Chinese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 8, 8.1, 10
  • Processor: Core i3 or more
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics Chip
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 2.5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated Sound Chip
